title: Pacifist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All references to Warmonger should refer to Warmonger (2487).
- Warmonger will always spawn. For all intents and purposes, you both count as one Town Power role combined.
- You cannot target Warmonger, and they cannot target you. Your abilities will fail if one is forced to target the other. (only the one who was controlled/redirected will fail, obviously)
- You know who the Warmonger is.
- If the Warmonger completes their subgoal before you, or you die and they survive, you lose.

- Pacifying a player grants them Invincible defense, purges them, but also reduces their attack value to None for that night.
- You are notified if you stop an attack, and on who.
- Pacified players require two extra votes to be hanged the day after they are pacified.
- You may not self-target.
- If you save an evil player from death, your ability will secretly fail tomorrow night.
- Conversion immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer, while also saving two good players from death.

desc:
Post 2486
*I think there's a more peaceful solution to our problems, is there not?*
